detailsData.title: Expertise in Mass Tort
detailsData.content: We have designed and implemented innovative resolution programs for hundreds of mass tort settlements. Our goal is always to PRESERVE the settlement funds of injured claimants while maintaining strict compliance to protect current and future benefits.

detailsData.title: Single Event Lien Resolution
detailsData.content: We have mastered healthcare reimbursement and Medicare Set-Aside obligations. Our highly experienced attorneys and experts PRESERVE benefits and settlement awards through ardent negotiations and planning.

detailsData.title: 20+ Years of Experience
detailsData.content: With over 20 years of combined expertise in pre- and post-settlement services, we provide best in class, white glove settlement administration services. Our mission is to PRESERVE settlement funds and future healthcare and other benefits.

detailsData.title: Compliance and Protection
detailsData.content: We maintain strict compliance to protect current and future benefits. Our innovative resolution programs ensure that settlement funds are preserved for the benefit of injured claimants.

valueProp: Headquartered in Austin, Texas, PRESERVE Settlements was founded by two of the nation's leading experts in single-event and mass tort lien resolution and claims administration. With 20+ years of combined expertise in pre- and post-settlement services, their unwavering mission is to provide best in class, white glove settlement administration services to purposefully PRESERVE settlement funds and future healthcare and other benefits through the negotiation, design, and implementation of efficient settlement programs.
